title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in TH, selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu does not lead to any action being taken.
EB: Selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu should add Javadoc to the field.
SR:
1. Open TH.
2. Right-click on a field.
3. Select the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu.
4. Verify that Javadoc is added to the field.
